name: Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 80's
detailed_description:
As a detective specializing in unusual cases, you just found the cold case of the century!
Back in 1987, Corey Savage disappeared off the face of the earth. His parents noticed the TV and Game Glove buzzing with a strange electricity...

Could these items hold the keys to this mystery?

Can you solve the puzzles in this preserved game room to unlock the secret of Corey’s disappearance?

Will you be transported to a retro-futuristic TV world to face off against an evil villain??

Filled with interactive toys and puzzles, the game encourages exploration, free play and problem solving. VR and game-loving audiences will love the retro aesthetics and nostalgic 80’s throwbacks.
